Package com.aware

Class Summary
Accelerometer AWARE Accelerometer module - Accelerometer raw data - Accelerometer sensor information
Accelerometer.AccelerometerMonitor BroadcastReceiver for Accelerometer module - Upload data to remote webservice: ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE
Accelerometer.AccelerometerProvider AWARE Accelerometer Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded accelerometer readings on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/accelerometer.db
Accelerometer.AccelerometerProvider.AccelerometerData Logged accelerometer data
Accelerometer.AccelerometerProvider.AccelerometerDevice Accelerometer device info
Accelerometer.BackgroundService Accelerometer background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP
Applications Service that logs application usage on the device.
Applications.ApplicationMonitor BroadcastReceiver for Applications module - Monitor for changes in running foreground/background applications: ACTION_AWARE_FOREGROUND_APPLICATION - Monitor for changes in installations on the device: Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_ADDED, Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_REPLACED, Intent#ACTION_PACKAGE_REMOVED
Applications.ApplicationsProvider AWARE Applications Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded applications on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/applications.db
Applications.ApplicationsProvider.ApplicationsContent  
Applications.ApplicationsProvider.ForegroundContent Applications content representation
Applications.ApplicationsProvider.InstallationsContent  
Applications.AwareMonitor Received AWARE broadcasts - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE - ACTION_AWARE_CLEAN_DATABASES
Applications.BackgroundService Applications background service - Updates the current running applications statistics - Uploads data to the webservice
Aware Main AWARE framework service.
Aware_Preferences Preferences dashboard for the AWARE Aware Allows the researcher to configure all the modules, start and stop modules and where logging happens.
Aware.AwareMonitor  
Aware.AwareProvider AWARE framework content provider - Device information - Framework settings TODO Plugins
Aware.AwareProvider.AwareDevice  
Aware.AwareProvider.AwareSettings  
Aware.BackgroundService Aware framework background service - Backup the device information
Aware.StorageMonitor  
Battery Service that logs power related events (battery and shutdown/reboot) - Battery changed - Battery charging - Battery discharging - Battery full - Battery low - Phone shutdown - Phone reboot
Battery.BackgroundService Battery background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP
Battery.BatteryMonitor BroadcastReceiver for Battery module - ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: battery values changed - ACTION_BATTERY_PLUGGED_AC: user is charging via AC - ACTION_BATTERY_PLUGGED_USB: user is charging via USB - ACTION_BATTERY_STATUS_FULL: battery finished charging - ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED: power is connected - ACTION_POWER_DISCONNECTED: power is disconnected - ACTION_BATTERY_LOW: battery is running low (15% by Android OS) - ACTION_SHUTDOWN: phone is about to shut down - ACTION_REBOOT: phone is about to reboot - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE: request for webservice remote backup
Battery.BatteryProvider AWARE Battery Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded battery events on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/battery.db
Battery.BatteryProvider.BatteryContent Battery content representation
Bluetooth Bluetooth Module.
Bluetooth.BackgroundService  
Bluetooth.BluetoothMonitor BroadcastReceiver for Bluetooth module - ACTION_AWARE_BLUETOOTH_REQUEST_SCAN: request a bluetooth scan - BluetoothDevice#ACTION_FOUND: a new bluetooth device was detected - BluetoothAdapter#ACTION_DISCOVERY_STARTED: discovery has started - BluetoothAdapter#ACTION_DISCOVERY_FINISHED: discovery has finished - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE: request for webservice remote backup
Bluetooth.BluetoothProvider AWARE Bluetooth Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded bluetooth devices on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/bluetooth.db
Bluetooth.BluetoothProvider.BluetoothData Logged bluetooth data
Bluetooth.BluetoothProvider.BluetoothDevice Bluetooth device info
BuildConfig  
Communication Capture users' communications (calls and messages) events
Communication.BackgroundService  
Communication.CommunicationMonitor  
Communication.CommunicationProvider AWARE Communication Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded communication events on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/communication.db
Communication.CommunicationProvider.CallData Calls content representation
Communication.CommunicationProvider.MessageData Messages content representation
ESM AWARE ESM module Allows a researcher to do ESM's on their studies Listens to: - ACTION_AWARE_QUEUE_ESM
ESM_dialog Shows an ESM dialog Since this is an activity, you'll need to set the ESM definition when calling this activity.
ESM_dialog.BackgroundService Background service that processes all the queued ESM's in a different thread.
ESM.BackgroundService ESM background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP - Clean database - Save ESM received to the database
ESM.ESMMonitor BroadcastReceiver for Light module - Upload data to remote webservice: ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE - Clean database on the device: ACTION_AWARE_CLEAN_DATABASES - Queue ESM: ACTION_AWARE_QUEUE_ESM
ESM.ESMProvider ESM Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded readings on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/esm.db
ESM.ESMProvider.ESMAnswers ESM answers
ESM.ESMProvider.ESMQuestions ESM questions

Gravity.GravityProvider.GravityData Logged sensor data
Gravity.GravityProvider.GravityDevice Sensor device info

LinearAccelerometer AWARE Linear-accelerometer module: A three dimensional vector indicating acceleration along each device axis, not including gravity.
LinearAccelerometer.BackgroundService Module background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP
LinearAccelerometer.LinearAccelerometerMonitor BroadcastReceiver for this module - Upload data to remote webservice: ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE

Mqtt Service that connects to the MQTT P2P network for AWARE
Mqtt.MqttProvider AWARE MQTT Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded MQTT messages and subscribed topics on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/mqtt.db
Mqtt.MqttProvider.MqttMessages MqttMessages content representation - MQTT_ID - MQTT_TIMESTAMP - MQTT_DEVICE_ID - MQTT_TOPIC - MQTT_MESSAGE - MQTT_STATUS : 1 - sent; 2 - received
Mqtt.MqttProvider.MqttSubscriptions  
Network Service that logs available network status: - on/off events - Traffic throughput I/O
Network.BackgroundService Background service for Network module Actions: - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE
Network.NetworkMonitor Network Monitor: logs connectivity changes on the device.
Network.NetworkProvider AWARE Network Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded network events on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/network.db
Network.NetworkProvider.NetworkContent Network content representation

Orientation.OrientationProvider.OrientationData Logged orientation data

Rotation.BackgroundService Accelerometer background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP

Screen.BackgroundService Background service for Screen module Actions: - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE
Screen.ScreenMonitor

Telephony Telephony module.
Telephony.BackgroundService  
Telephony.TelephonyMonitor Telephony module broadcast receiver - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE: upload data to remote server
Telephony.TelephonyProvider AWARE Telephony Content Provider Allows you to access recorded telephony, cell and neighbor towers from the database Database is located at the SDCard: /AWARE/telephony.db
Telephony.TelephonyProvider.CdmaData CDMA data representation
Telephony.TelephonyProvider.GsmData GSM data representation
Telephony.TelephonyProvider.GsmNeighborsData GSM neighbor data representation
Telephony.TelephonyProvider.TelephonyData Telephony data representation
Telephony.TelephonyState Tracks cell location and telephony information: - GSM: CID, LAC, PSC (UMTS Primary Scrambling Code) - CDMA: base station ID, Latitude, Longitude, Network ID, System ID - Telephony: IMEI/MEID/ESN, software version, line number, network MMC, network code, network name, network type, phone type, sim code, sim operator, sim serial, subscriber ID
Temperature AWARE Temperature module - Temperature raw data in ambient room temperature in degree Celsius - Temperature sensor information
Temperature.BackgroundService Module background service - Backup data to webservice HTTP
Temperature.TemperatureMonitor BroadcastReceiver for this module - Upload data to remote webservice: ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE
Temperature.TemperatureProvider AWARE Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded readings on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/temperature.db
Temperature.TemperatureProvider.TemperatureData Logged sensor data
Temperature.TemperatureProvider.TemperatureDevice Sensor device info
Traffic Service that logs I/O traffic from WiFi, Bluetooth, mobile network
Traffic.BackgroundService Background service for Traffic module - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE - ACTION_AWARE_TRAFFIC_REFRESH
Traffic.TrafficMonitor Traffic monitor: updates the traffic from mobile, bluetooth and wifi.
Traffic.TrafficProvider AWARE Traffic Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded network traffic on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/traffic.db
Traffic.TrafficProvider.TrafficContent Traffic content representation

WiFi.WiFiMonitor  
WiFi.WiFiProvider AWARE WiFi Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded wifi AP devices on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/wifi.db
